alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Suwannee, northwestern Hamilton and southwestern Echols Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crossroads, or near Jennings, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee River State Park, Blue Springs and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
